making it easier to write, find and run tests.

Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.description:
The trove-classifiers pacakge is the canonical source for classifiers on
PyPI. Classifiers categorize projects per PEP 301.

dependent_to.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.
dependent_to.name: py-beautifulsoup4

dependent_to.description:
BigDFT: the python interface of BigDFT for electronic structure
calculation based on Daubechies wavelets.
dependent_to.name: py-bigdft

dependent_to.description:
Biotite is your Swiss army knife for bioinformatics. Whether you want to
identify homologous sequence regions in a protein family or you would
like to find disulfide bonds in a protein structure: Biotite has the
right tool for you. This package bundles popular tasks in computational
molecular biology into a uniform Python library.
dependent_to.name: py-biotite

dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.
dependent_to.name: py-black

dependent_to.description: Cross-platform colored terminal text.
dependent_to.name: py-colorama

dependent_to.description:
Jupyter Python Comm implementation, for usage in ipykernel, xeus-python
etc.
dependent_to.name: py-comm

dependent_to.description:
Datashader is a data rasterization pipeline for automating the process
of creating meaningful representations of large amounts of data
dependent_to.name: py-datashader

dependent_to.description:
Scalable asynchronous hyperparameter optimization, neural architecture
search, and parallel ensemble of predictive models.
dependent_to.name: py-deephyper

dependent_to.description: Code Editor-style reprs for Earth Engine data in a Jupyter notebook.

dependent_to.description:
Flexible and powerful tensor operations for readable and reliable code.
Supports numpy, pytorch, tensorflow, and others.
dependent_to.name: py-einops

dependent_to.description:
Equinox is a comprehensive JAX library that provides a wide range of
tools and features not found in core JAX, including neural networks with
PyTorch-like syntax, filtered APIs for transformations, PyTree
manipulation routines, and advanced features like runtime errors.
dependent_to.name: py-equinox

dependent_to.description: Expand system variables Unix style.

FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready

dependent_to.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication

Formulaic is a high-performance implementation of Wilkinson formulas for

dependent_to.description:
A Python library designed to make data analysis and visualization
seamless and simple.
dependent_to.name: py-holoviews

dependent_to.description:
The HTTP Core package provides a minimal low-level HTTP client, which
does one thing only. Sending HTTP requests.
dependent_to.name: py-httpcore

dependent_to.description:
HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync
and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.
dependent_to.name: py-httpx

dependent_to.description:
This modest package contains various common humanization utilities, like
turning a number into a fuzzy human readable duration ('3 minutes ago')
or into a human readable size or throughput. It works with python 2.7
and 3.3 and is localized to Russian, French, Korean and Slovak.
dependent_to.name: py-humanize

dependent_to.description: iniconfig: brain-dead simple parsing of ini files

JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project

dependent_to.name: py-nibabel

dependent_to.description: Use numba-compiled kernels from within Jax
dependent_to.name: py-numba4jax

dependent_to.description:
This package creates a quaternion type in python, and further enables
numpy to create and manipulate arrays of quaternions. The usual
algebraic operations (addition and multiplication) are available, along
with numerous properties like norm and various types of distance
measures between two quaternions. There are also additional functions
like "squad" and "slerp" interpolation, and conversions to and from
axis-angle, matrix, and Euler-angle representations of rotations. The
core of the code is written in C for speed.
dependent_to.name: py-numpy-quaternion

dependent_to.description: Optimized Einsum: A tensor contraction order optimizer.
dependent_to.name: py-opt-einsum

dependent_to.description: A high level app and dashboarding solution for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-panel

dependent_to.description:
Param is a library providing Parameters: Python attributes extended to
have features such as type and range checking, dynamically generated
values, documentation strings, default values, etc., each of which is
inherited from parent classes if not specified in a subclass.
dependent_to.name: py-param

dependent_to.description:
Particle provides a pythonic interface to the Particle Data Group (PDG)
particle data tables and particle identification codes, with extended
particle information and extra goodies.
dependent_to.name: py-particle

dependent_to.description: Command line utility to show dependency tree of packages.
dependent_to.name: py-pipdeptree

dependent_to.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir"
dependent_to.name: py-platformdirs

dependent_to.description: Multiple dispatch in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-plum-dispatch

dependent_to.description:
PrettyTable is a simple Python library designed to make it quick and
easy to represent tabular data in visually appealing ASCII tables.
dependent_to.name: py-prettytable

dependent_to.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.
dependent_to.name: py-pydantic

dependent_to.description:
A place for pydantic types that probably shouldn't exist in the main
pydantic lib.
dependent_to.name: py-pydantic-extra-types

dependent_to.description: Settings management using Pydantic.
dependent_to.name: py-pydantic-settings

dependent_to.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.

dependent_to.description:
pyIsEmail is a no-nonsense approach for checking whether that user-
supplied email address could be real.
dependent_to.name: py-pyisemail

dependent_to.description: Extensions for Python Markdown.
dependent_to.name: py-pymdown-extensions

dependent_to.description:
The PyMongo distribution contains tools for interacting with MongoDB
database from Python. The bson package is an implementation of the BSON
format for Python. The pymongo package is a native Python driver for
MongoDB. The gridfs package is a gridfs implementation on top of
pymongo.
dependent_to.name: py-pymongo

dependent_to.description: pytest plugin for snapshot regression testing.
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-regtest

dependent_to.description: A streaming multipart parser for Python
dependent_to.name: py-python-multipart

dependent_to.description: Bidirectional communication for the HoloViz ecosystem.
dependent_to.name: py-pyviz-comms

dependent_to.description:
A way to write reusable components in a React-like way, to make Python-
based UI's using the ipywidgets ecosystem (ipywidgets, ipyvolume,
bqplot, threejs, leaflet, ipyvuetify, ...).
dependent_to.name: py-reacton

dependent_to.description: JSON Referencing + Python.
dependent_to.name: py-referencing

dependent_to.description: A Git client for mirroring multiple remotes without storing state.
dependent_to.name: py-repligit

dependent_to.description:
rich-argparse improves the look and readability of argparse's help while
requiring minimal changes to the code.
dependent_to.name: py-rich-argparse

dependent_to.description: Python implementations of commonly used sensitivity analysis methods.
dependent_to.name: py-salib

dependent_to.description:
scikit-build is an improved build system generator for CPython
C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It provides better support for
additional compilers, build systems, cross compilation, and locating
dependencies and their associated build requirements. The scikit-build
package is fundamentally just glue between the setuptools Python module
and CMake.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build

dependent_to.description:
scikit-build-core is a doubly improved build system generator for
CPython C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It features several
improvements over the classic scikit-build build system generator.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build-core

dependent_to.description: A modern CSS selector implementation for Beautiful Soup.
dependent_to.name: py-soupsieve

dependent_to.description: Pandas extension arrays for spatial/geometric operations.
dependent_to.name: py-spatialpandas

dependent_to.description: Sphinx Domain for Modern CMake.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinxcontrib-moderncmakedomain

dependent_to.description: A non-validating SQL parser module for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-sqlparse

dependent_to.description: The little ASGI library that shines.
dependent_to.name: py-starlette

dependent_to.description: Missing widgets and components for PyQt/PySide
dependent_to.name: py-superqt

dependent_to.description: Terminals served to term.js using Tornado websockets
dependent_to.name: py-terminado

dependent_to.description: Traitlets Python config system
dependent_to.name: py-traitlets

dependent_to.description: An asynchronous networking framework written in Python
dependent_to.name: py-twisted

dependent_to.description:
Unified Histogram Interface: tools to help library authors work with
histograms
dependent_to.name: py-uhi

dependent_to.description:
ROOT I/O in pure Python and NumPy. Uproot is a reader and a writer of
the ROOT file format using only Python and Numpy. Unlike the standard
C++ ROOT implementation, Uproot is only an I/O library, primarily
intended to stream data into machine learning libraries in Python.
Unlike PyROOT and root_numpy, Uproot does not depend on C++ ROOT.
Instead, it uses Numpy to cast blocks of data from the ROOT file as
Numpy arrays.
dependent_to.name: py-uproot

dependent_to.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.
dependent_to.name: py-urllib3

dependent_to.description: Cross-platform tool for adding locations to the user PATH.
dependent_to.name: py-userpath

dependent_to.description: The lightning-fast ASGI server.
dependent_to.name: py-uvicorn

dependent_to.description: Vector classes and utilities
dependent_to.name: py-vector

dependent_to.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.
dependent_to.name: py-virtualenv

dependent_to.description: A Wadler–Lindig pretty-printer for Python
dependent_to.name: py-wadler-lindig

dependent_to.description: Regridding utility for xarray
dependent_to.name: py-xarray-regrid

dependent_to.description:
XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed
to be highly efficient, flexible and portable.
dependent_to.name: py-xgboost

dependent_to.description:
Zarr is a Python package providing an implementation of chunked,
compressed, N-dimensional arrays.
dependent_to.name: py-zarr
